name: teams-clone-team
title: Clone a Microsoft Team with\without content
shortDescription: This script allow us to clone an existing team (structure and content!) into a new one with changed attributes including content.
longDescription: On the new to be 'cloned' team we can define name, description, visibility and 'parts to clone' ('Apps','Tabs','Settings','Channels',  'Members'). We can actually clone content also. The script is a subset of the SPO powershell packages with content (PnPCandy) concept already been used across many projects.

references.name: Want to learn more about PnP PowerShell and the cmdlets
references.description: Check out the PnP PowerShell site to get started and for the reference to the cmdlets.
